Translations.Text: What do they ask each other about
About the great news
The one that they disagree about it
No way, they are going to know
Then, no way, they are going to know
Did We not make the earth a bed (to rest on)
and the mountains as pins
And We created you in pairs
And We made your sleep as a rest
And We made the night as a cover
And We made the day as a livelihood (to earn a living)
And We built seven stable (skies) above you
And We made (sun) a glowing lamp
And We sent down plenty of rain from the dense clouds
that We bring out with it grain and plant
and dense (and luxurious) gardens
Indeed the day of separation/decision is an appointed time
A day when the trumpet is blown and you come in bunches
And the sky is opened and becomes gates
and the mountains are moved and become a mirage
Indeed hell is an ambush
as a place of return for the rebellious ones
staying in it for a long time
They do not taste anything cool or any drink in it
except boiling water and pus
An appropriate punishment
They were not expecting an accounting
and they strongly denied Our signs
while We keep track of everything in a book
So taste (the punishment), for We never add anything to you except punishment
Indeed victory is for those who control themselves
Fenced gardens and vineyards
and fully developed maidens of the same age
and overflowing cups
They do not hear any useless talk or any lies in there
A reward from your Master, a calculated reward
(a reward from the) Master of the skies and the earth and whatever is between them, the beneficent. They do not have any authority from Him to talk
A day when the spirit and the angels stand in a row, they do not speak except anyone whom the beneficent permits him and he says what is right
This is the day of the truth. Therefore anyone who wants, he takes a way of return to his Master
Indeed We warned you of a forthcoming punishment, a day when a person looks at what his hands sent ahead, and the disbeliever says: I wish I was dust
By those who pull out intensely
and by those who let out gently
and by those who swim/float smoothly
and by those who move ahead, outpacing
and by those who manage an affair
on a day that the earthquake shakes (the earth)
the subsequent one follows it
on that day hearts tremble
their eyes humbled (looking down)
they say: will we be restored to the original form
even when we are decomposed bones
They say: then that would be a losing return
Then it is only a single scream
and they are immediately awake
Did the story of Moses come to you
When his Master called him in the holy valley of Tuwa
go to Pharaoh for indeed he rebelled
Then say: do you like to purify (and absolve) yourself
and I guide you to your Master so you would fear (Him)
Then he showed him the great miracle
But he denied and disobeyed
then he turned his back trying (against God)
Then he gathered (his people) and called out
and said: I am your master, the highest
So God took him with exemplary punishment of the hereafter and this life
Indeed there is a lesson in that for anyone who fears (God)
Are you harder to create or the sky that He built it
He raised its roof and arranged it
And He darkened its nights and brought out its daylight
And after that He expanded the earth
He brought out its water and its pasture from it
and He set the mountains firm
An enjoyment for you and your livestock
So when the great disaster comes
a day when the human being remembers what he tried
and the hellfire is exposed for anyone who sees
So anyone who rebelled
and preferred this world's life
then indeed the hellfire is the housing (for him)
And as for someone who is afraid of his Master's position and prevents himself from the desires
then indeed the garden is the housing (for him)
They ask you about the hour that when does it come in
In what (basis) would you mention it (when you have no knowledge of it)
Its ending is up to your Master
You are only a warner for anyone who fears it
A day that they see it, it is as if they stayed an evening or its morning
He frowned and turned away
because the blind man came to him
And how would you know, he may purify himself
or take notice, so the reminder would benefit him
But whoever supposes he has no need
then you pay attention to him
while it is not your responsibility if he did not purify
But whoever comes to you rushing
and he fears (God)
then you pay no attention to him
No way, it (Quran) is a reminder
and anyone who wants takes notice from it
In honored scriptures
elevated and purified
by the hands of ambassadors/scribes
noble and good
Damn the human being, how ungrateful he is
What did He create him from
He created him from a fertilized egg (Zygote), then proportioned him
Then He made the way easy for him
Then He made him die and had him buried
Then He raises him when He wants
No way, he did not fulfill what He ordered him
So the human being should look at his food
Indeed We poured the rain as shower
then We split open the earth as cracks
then We made grain grow in it
and grapes and vegetable
and olive and date
and fenced gardens with lots of trees
and fruit and grass
an enjoyment for you and your livestock
So when the deafening blast comes
a day when the man runs away from his brother
and his mother and his father
and his spouse and his sons (children)
on that day every one of them has an issue occupying him
On that day (some) faces are bright
laughing and joyful
And on that day (other) faces have dust on them
darkness covers it
they are the disbelievers, the immoral ones
When the sun is rolled up
and when the stars are dimmed
and when the mountains are moved
and when the ten months pregnant camels are abandoned
and when the wild animals are gathered
and when the seas are set on fire
and when the souls are paired
and when the girl buried alive is asked
for what sin she was killed
and when the pages (of deeds) are opened
and when the sky is removed
and when the hellfire is flared up
and when the garden is brought near
a person knows what he brought along
So I swear by the returning stars/planets
running their course (and orbit) and hiding
and by the night when it turns dark
and by the morning when it breathes (and lights up)
indeed it (Quran) is word of a noble messenger
powerful and distinguished with the owner of the throne
he is obeyed and is honest
And your companion is not a madman
and he has certainly seen him on the clear horizon
And he is not stingy with the unseen (that is revealed to him)
and it is not word of expelled Satan
So where are you going
It is not but a reminder for humankind
for anyone of you who want to go straight
And you do not want (anything) except that which God, Master of humankind wants
When the sky is split
and when the stars are scattered
and when the seas are flooded (and overflow)
and when the graves are turned upside down
a person knows what he sent ahead and put off
Human being, what deceived you about your noble Master
The One who created you, then He shaped you and balanced you
And He put you together in whatever form He wanted
No way, but you deny the Judgment
while indeed there are guardians over you
nobles writing down
who know whatever you do
Indeed the good ones are in delight
and indeed the immoral ones are in hellfire
They enter (and burn in) there on the judgment day
and they are not absent from it (beyond its reach)
And do you know what the judgment day is
And again, do you know what the judgment day is
A day when a person does not have the least bit of power for another one, and on that day the command (and judgment) belongs to God
Woe to those who give less than is due (the cheaters)
those who when they take a measure (or an amount) from people, they take it in full
and when they give an amount to them or they weigh for them, they give less
Do they not think that indeed they will be raised
for a great day
A day when people stand before the Master of Human kind
No way, definitely the record of the immoral ones is in Sijjin
And do you know what Sijjin is
It is a written book
Woe to the deniers on that day
those who deny the judgment day
And no one denies it except every sinner exceeding the limits
When Our verses are read to him, he says: stories of the earlier ones
No way, but what they used to do covered their hearts with rust
No way, indeed on that day they are excluded from their Master
Then indeed they shall enter (and burn in) the hellfire
Then it is said: this is what you used to deny it
No way, indeed the record of the good ones is certainly in Illiyin
And do you know what Illiyin is
A written book
the close ones (to God) testify to it
Indeed the good ones shall be in delight
They are on the sofas looking
You recognize glow of the delight in their faces
They are given sealed nectar to drink
Its seal is musk. And the contenders should compete for that
And its mixture is from Tasneem
a spring that the close ones (to God) drink from it
Indeed those who were guilty used to laugh at those who believed
and when they passed by them, they would wink at each other (ridiculing them)
and when they returned to their people they would return joyfully
and when they saw them, they would say: these are certainly lost ones
Although they were not sent as guardians over them
So today those who believed laugh at the disbelievers
they are on sofas looking
Were the disbelievers rewarded for (anything other than) what they used to do
When the sky splits
and it listens to its Master and it is required (to listen)
and when the earth is stretched
and throws out what is inside of it and becomes empty
and it listens to its Master and it is required (to listen)
Human being, indeed you are a hard worker toward your Master, working hard, and you meet Him
As for anyone who is given his book to his right hand
then he is called to account, an easy account
and he returns happily to his family
But anyone who is given his book from behind his back
Then he will call for destruction (and his death)
while he enters (and burns in) the burning fire
Indeed he was happy among his family
Indeed he thought that he would never return
Yes, his Master was indeed watching him
So I swear by the sunset glow
and the night and what it collects
and the moon when it is full
that you shall move on from state after state
So what is with them that they do not believe
and when the Quran is read to them, they do not show humbleness
No, but those who disbelieved deny
and God knows better what they hold (inside them)
So give them the news of a painful punishment
except those who believed and did good works, as they have an unending reward
By the sky having the constellations
and by the promised day
and by a witness and a witnessed
Damn the directors of the fire pit
the fire having (plenty of) the fuel
when they sat around it
and they were witnesses over what they did to the believers
And they only took revenge from them for believing in God the powerful, the praiseworthy
The One that the rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him, and God is a witness over everything
Indeed those who persecuted (and tortured) the believing men and the believing women and did not repent, punishment of hell is for them and the burning punishment is for them
Indeed those who believed and did good works, for them are gardens which rivers flow through them. That is the great victory
Indeed your Master’s assault is severe
Indeed He initiates and repeats (the creation)
and He is the forgiving, the most friendly
owner of the glorious throne
doer of what He wants
Did the story of the armies come to you
Pharaoh and the Thamud
But those who disbelieved are in a denial
And God is surrounding over and above them
This is a glorious Quran
in a guarded (and protected) tablet
By the sky and the night-comer (the evening star)
And do you know what the evening star is
It is the sharp bright star
Indeed every person has a guardian (watching) over him
So the human being should look at what he is created from
He is created from an ejected fluid
coming out from between the backbone and the ribs
Indeed He is capable of his return
a day that the secrets are disclosed
then he has no power and no helper
And by the sky that has the returning (rain clouds)
and by the earth having the crack (for sprouting)
indeed it (Quran) is a decisive word
and it is not a joke
Indeed they plot a plot
and I plan a plan
So give the disbelievers time, give them time without rushing
Glorify the name of your Master, the highest
The One who created, then shaped
and the One who decreed and guided
and the One who brought out the pastures
then He made it dried up and black
We are going to read (Quran) to you, and you will not forget
except what God wants. Indeed He knows the evident and what is hidden
And We make you ready for the easier way
So remind if the reminder benefits
Then anyone who fears, is going to take notice
while the most miserable ones avoid it
the one who enters (and burns in) the great fire
he does not die and he does not live in there
Everyone has succeeded who purified (himself)
and remembered the name of his Master, and prayed
No, but you prefer this world's life
while the hereafter is better and more lasting
Indeed this is in the earlier scriptures
scriptures of Abraham and Moses
Did the story of the overwhelming come to you
On that day (some) faces are humble
working hard, exhausted
entering (and burning in) a scorching fire
they are made to drink from a boiling spring
There is no food for them except from a thorny plant
that does not nourish and it does not satisfy hunger
On that day (other) faces are delightful
pleased with their effort
in an excellent garden
they do not hear any useless talk in it
a running spring in it
raised sofas in it
and drinking glasses set in place
and pillows arranged in rows
and spread out rugs
Do they not look at the camel, how it is created
And at the sky, how it is raised
And at the mountain, how it is set up
And at the earth, how it is spread out
So remind (them), for you are only to remind
You are not an overseer for them
But anyone who turns away and disbelieves
then God punishes him with the great punishment
Indeed their return is to Us
then indeed their accounting is on Us
By the dawn
and by the ten nights
and by the even and the odd
and by the night when it goes away
Is there an oath in that for one who has understanding
Did you not see what your Master did with Aad
(people of) Iram (a city) with the pillars
the like of which was not created in the lands
and Thamud those who carved out the rocks in the valley
and Pharaoh having the stakes (pyramids)
Those who rebelled in the lands
and increased the corruption in it
so your Master unleashed the whip of punishment on them
Indeed your Master is on the watch
As for the human being, when his Master tests him and honors him and favors him, then he says: my Master honored me
But when his Master tests him and decreases his provisions for him, then he says: my Master dishonored me
No way, but you do not respect the orphan
and you do not encourage one another about feeding the poor
and you eat up the inheritance, eating up altogether
and you love the wealth, a great deal of love
No way, when the earth is pounded, crushed and leveled
and you Master comes, and the angels (come) row by row
and on that day hell is brought, on that day the human being takes notice, but what (use) does the notice have for him
He says: I wish that I had sent ahead (something) for my (new) life
So on that day no one punishes as He punishes
and no one ties up as He ties up
You the reassured soul
return to your Master, pleased (with Him) and pleasing (to Him)
so you enter among My servants
and you enter My garden
I swear by this land
and you are a resident of this land
and by the father and what he fathered
that We have certainly created the human being in distress
Does he think that no one will ever have power over him
He says: I wasted a lot of wealth
Does he think that no one saw him
Did we not make two eyes for him
and a tongue and two lips
and We guided him to the two ways
But he did not take/attempt the winding mountain road
And do you know what the winding mountain road is
(It is) freeing a slave
or in a day of famine, feeding
an orphan being related
or a poor person in ruins (and penniless)
then being of those who believed and recommend one another to the perseverance (and patience) and recommend one another to kindness
They are associates of the right hand (the fortunate)
And those who disbelieved in Our signs, they are associates of the left hand (the unfortunate)
and a fire is closed over upon them
By the sun and its glow
and by the moon when it follows it
and by the day when it shows it
and by the night when it covers it
and by the sky and what built it
and the earth and what extended it
and by the soul and what shaped it
and inspired it to its immoralities and its self control
(that) anyone who purifies it, has succeeded
and anyone who corrupts it, has failed
Thamud denied with their rebellion
When the most nasty of them rose up
then God's messenger said to them: (that is) God's female camel and her share of drink
Then they denied him and killed her, then their Master fully punished them for their sins and leveled them (to the ground)
and He was not afraid of its outcome
By the night when it covers
and by the day when it shows
and by what created the male and the female
indeed your efforts are different
As for anyone who gives and controls himself
and confirms the goodness
then We are going to get him ready for the easy way
And as for anyone who is stingy and supposes he has no need
and denies the goodness
then We are going to get him ready for the difficult way
and his wealth will be of no use when he falls (dead)
Indeed the guidance is Our responsibility
And the hereafter and the first (this world) belong to Us
So I warn you of a flaming fire
no one enters (and burns in) it except the most unfortunate
the one who denied and turned away
And the more cautious (of God) are going to be kept away from it
The one who gives his wealth to be purified
And no one has any favor with Him to be rewarded (for it)
except (anyone who) looks for the attention (and pleasure) of his Master, the highest
and he is going to be pleased
By the daylight
and by the night when it quiets
(that) your Master did not abandon you and He is not upset
And the hereafter is certainly better for you than the first (this life)
And your Master will certainly give you (enough) so you are pleased
Did He not find you an orphan and sheltered you
and found you a lost one and guided you
and found you in need and made you needless
As for the orphan, do not mistreat them
And as for the one who asks (the beggar), do not drive them away
And as for the favor of your Master, speak of it
Did we not expand your chest for you
and We rid you of your burden
that (almost) broke your back
and We elevated your reputation for you
So with the difficulty (and hardship) there is ease
Indeed with the difficulty there is ease
So when you are done (with your duties), then work hard (for other duties)
And be eager for (and be fond of) your Master
By the fig and the olive
and by mount Sinai
and by this safe land
(that) We have certainly created the human being in the best form
then We returned him to the lowest of low
except those who believed and did good works, so there is an unending reward for them
So what makes you deny the way of life (or the judgment day) after this
Is not God the wisest of the judges
Read in the name of your Master, the One who created
created the human being from a (dangling, clinging, and leach like) blood clot
Read and (know that) your Master is the most noble
the One who taught by the pen
He taught the human being what he did not know
No way, the human being shall certainly rebel
if he sees himself as having no need
Indeed the return is to your Master
Did you see the one who forbids
a servant when he performs mandatory prayer
Did you see if he is on the guidance
or he orders to self control (against unlawful desires and sins)
Did you see if he denied and turned away
Did he not know that God sees (everything)
No way, if he does not stop (this behavior) We shall grab him by the forelock
a sinful lying forelock
Then he should call on his peers
(and) We are going to call on the guards of hell
No way, do not obey him, and show humbleness and get close (to God)
Indeed We sent it (Quran) down in the night of destiny (or the night of power)
And do you know what the night of destiny is
The night of destiny is better than a thousand months
The angels and the spirit came down in it, by their Master's permission, (with mandates) for every matter
It is peace (and well-being) until the rising of the dawn
Those who disbelieved among people of the book and the polytheists were not to disengage (from their ideas) until the clear proof came to them
a messenger from God reading purified scriptures
with true (and lasting) writings in it
And those who were given the book did not become divided until after the clear proof had come to them

And they were only ordered to serve God, being sincere to Him in the way of life (religion) as a monotheist, and perform the mandatory prayers and give the mandatory charity. And that is the lasting religion
Indeed those who disbelieved among people of the book and the polytheists will be in fire of hell, remaining in there forever. They are worst of the creatures
Those who believed and did good works, they are best of the creatures

Their reward with their Master is eternal gardens which rivers flow through them, remaining in there forever and ever. God is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. That is for anyone who fears his Master
When the earth is shaken by its earthquake
and the earth unloads its heavy loads
and the human being says: what is the matter with it
On that day it speaks out its stories
because your Master revealed to it
On that day people come out in separate groups to be shown their works
And anyone who does a tiny bit of good sees it
and anyone who does a tiny bit of bad sees it
By the horses making charge, snorting
and the producers of sparks, striking (their horseshoe)
and the attackers in the morning
that raise cloud of dust with it
and penetrate to the middle of it (the battle) together
indeed the human being is ungrateful to his Master
and he is certainly a witness to that
and indeed his love for the good things (and wealth) is extreme
Does he not know that, when what is in the graves is turned upside down
and what is in the chests is exposed
indeed their Master is well aware of them on that day
The pounding disaster
What is the pounding disaster
And do you know what the pounding disaster is
A day when the people become like scattered butterflies
and the mountains become like fluffed up colored wool
As for anyone whose balance (of good deeds) is heavy
then he is in a pleasant life
And as for anyone whose balance (of good deeds) is light
then his residence is a bottomless pit
And you don't even know what it is
(It is) a scorching fire
The competition for having more distracted you
to a point that you visited the graves
No way, you will know
And once more, no way, you will know
No way, if you knew the sure knowledge (you would know that)
you shall see the hellfire
then you shall see it with the sure eye
Then, on that day, you shall be questioned about the pleasures (you had in life)
By the time (the ages)
indeed the human being is in loss
except those who believe and do good works and recommend one another to the truth and recommend one another to the patience (and perseverance)
Woe to every slanderer and fault-finder
The one who piles up wealth and keeps count of it
thinking that his wealth (and possession) makes him immortal
No way, he shall be thrown into the crushing fire
And do you know what the crushing fire is
(It is) burning fire of God
which rises over (and overtakes) the hearts
indeed it closes over them
in extending columns
Did you not see what your Master did to companions of the elephant
Did He not make their plot go wrong
and sent flocks of bird on them
throwing stones of baked clay at them
then He made them like chewed up straw
For keeping/protection of the Quraish
their keeping/protection for the winter and the summer journey
so they should serve the Master of this house
the One who fed them in hunger and made them safe from fear
Did you see the one who denies the religion (or the judgment day)
That is the one who pushes the orphan away
and does not encourage feeding the poor
So woe to those who perform mandatory prayer
those who are forgetful of their mandatory prayer
those who make a show (and pretend)
and withhold the small kindnesses
Indeed We gave you plenty
So perform mandatory prayer and sacrifice for your Master
Indeed your hater, he is cut off (and is childless)
Say: you the disbelievers
I do not serve what you serve
and you are not servants of what I serve
and I am not a servant of what you serve
and you are not servants of what I serve
your way of life (religion) for you and my way of life for me
When God's help and the victory comes
and you see the people entering into God's way of life in bunches
glorify you Master with His praise and ask His forgiveness. Indeed He is acceptor of repentance
May Abu Lahab's both hands perish (or may Abu Lahab's power perish), and it perished
His wealth and what he earned was of no use to him
He is going to enter (and burn in) a flaming fire
and (so is) his wife, carrier of the firewood
around her neck is a rope from palm fiber
Say: He is the One God
God is the eternal and the needless and the needed
He did not reproduce, and He was not born
and there is no one equal (or comparable) to Him
Say: I look for protection of the Master of the morning twilight
from the harm of whatever He created
and from the harm of darkness when it comes
and from the harm of the blowers into the knots (who practices witchcraft)
and from the harm of an envious when he envies
Say: I look for protection of the Master of the people
king of the people
god of the people
from the harm of the withdrawing tempter (who withdraws at the mention of God)
the one who tempts in the people's hearts
(whether) from the Jinn or the people
